name: ConsumptionRequest
desc: The request body containing consumption information.

items.name: accountTenure
items.desc: (Required) The age of the customer’s account.

items.name: appAccountToken
items.desc: (Required) The UUID of the in-app user account that completed the consumable in-app purchase transaction.

items.name: consumptionStatus
items.desc: (Required) A value that indicates the extent to which the customer consumed the in-app purchase.

items.name: customerConsented
items.desc: (Required) A Boolean value of true or false that indicates whether the customer consented to provide consumption data.

items.name: deliveryStatus
items.desc: (Required) A value that indicates whether the app successfully delivered an in-app purchase that works properly.

items.name: lifetimeDollarsPurchased
items.desc: (Required) A value that indicates the total amount, in USD, of in-app purchases the customer has made in your app, across all platforms.

items.name: lifetimeDollarsRefunded
items.desc: (Required) A value that indicates the total amount, in USD, of refunds the customer has received, in your app, across all platforms.

items.name: platform
items.desc: (Required) A value that indicates the platform on which the customer consumed the in-app purchase.

items.name: playTime
items.desc: (Required) A value that indicates the amount of time that the customer used the app.

items.name: sampleContentProvided
items.desc: (Required) A Boolean value of true or false that indicates whether you provided, prior to its purchase, a free sample or trial of the content, or information about its functionality.

items.name: userStatus
items.desc: (Required) The status of the customer’s account.
